title: Assassins Creed III (v1.06 + ALL DLC) (ENG/MULTi) [RePack]
description:
INFORMATION:
Release date: November 20, 2012
Release date in Russia: 22 November 2012
Genre: Action
Developer: Ubisoft
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Publisher in Russia: Akella
Localizer: Akella
Interface language: English, Polish
Language of voice: English
Version: v.1.06
Publication Type: Rip
Tablet: Wash (THETA)

System requirements:
√ Operating System: Windows® Vista SP2 / Windows® 7 SP1
√ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo - 2.66 GHz / AMD Athlon II - 2.6 GHz
√ Memory: 2 GB
√ Video card: 512 MB (GeForce 8800 GT / Radeon HD 4850)
√ Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
√ Free space on the hard disk: 12 GB

Description:
A full third of the series Assassin's Creed. We have to play the role of half-blood - the British on the paternal line and the Mohawk Indian by the mother - with a strange name for our ear Ratohnaké: ton. The events of Assassin's Creed 3 will develop during the War of Independence of the United States.

You are Assassin Connor, who has vowed to preserve the freedom and security of his people and his country. To do this, you will have to go hunting for your enemies in a huge, open and completely realistic world.

In a cruel pursuit, you use all your deadly skills, moving from the busy city streets to the bloody battlefields, and from there - to the harsh edges of the American Frontier.

In Assassin Creed 3 you will meet the legendary heroes of American history and together you will be able to destroy those who threaten freedom itself. Whether you use your predator instincts to kill secretly, or use your entire murderous arsenal openly, one thing is clear: the world where the Assassins live is even more dangerous. And with him - and you yourself
